title: FS: T206 Ed Reulbach (glove shows) SGC 84, **SOLD**
author: CMIZ5290

posts.post_title: FS: T206 Ed Reulbach (glove shows) SGC 84, **SOLD**
posts.post_content: One of the toughest commons to find in high grade. Card features 50/50 centering (rare for this card), and spotless Pied 150 back. A recent PSA 7 just sold for over $2k, and a PSA 8 for close to $10k, priced at $725 delivered.... please send me your email for pics, thanks.... **SOLD**
